['DescriptionRange International Property Investments presents a spacious & luxury Mediterranean inspired villa of 2 BR plus maid at Villanova, a neighborhood that you can call your own.\xa0The cluster homes, villas, townhouses & apartments along with vast open spaces, create a serene atmosphere where the community becomes an extended family & the neighbors become friends. A vibrant atmosphere, where the sound of birds chirping in the open green expanse blends in with the sounds of kids playing in the neighborhood. Experience the beautiful landscaped walking trails, along efficiently laid out homes at Villanova, inspired by Mediterranean architecture. Involve yourself in recreational activities in the facilities that are offered, jog with your friends on the \x91paseos\x92, or relish a quiet picnic with your loved ones on the lawns.Townhouse plans are designed for a comfortable family living for small and larger families alike, with spacious living rooms, expansive master suites, and luxurious kitchens.']

descriptions: ["DescriptionLUXHABITAT is glad to offer this unique beachfront property in the residence of the 5-star resort Anantara Dubai. The property is 2- bedroom deluxe apartment, featuring best layout and enormous outdoor living, perfect for entertainment. The property offers views of the Anantara Lagoon, Atlantis the Palm, Royal Atlantis, Burj Al Arab and the Arabian sea. This apartment can act perfectly as a holiday home as it features the facilities of the hotel that include a spa, infinity pools and lagoons, fine dining restaurants and white sand beach. This property is being sold by a motivated seller with 20% less than its original price. \nThe Anantara Residences is designed with relaxation in mind with access to all 5-star facilities on offer at the Anantara The Palm Dubai Resort including the private beach and 10,000 square meters of temperature controlled lagoon swimming pools. Residents also have access to a wide variety of leisure facilities on offer such as a state-of-the-art fully equipped gymnasium, tennis courts and a kids' play area. To ensure a real luxury resort lifestyle, residents can also enjoy the mouth-watering culinary delights offered in the resort's restaurants and also indulge in the tranquillity on offer at the signature Anantara Spa. To help make living in The Anantara Residences as stress-free and convenient as possible, residents can enjoy the benefits of a variety of exclusive Ã\xa0 la carte services, such as room service, babysitting, concierge services, housekeeping and valet parking - ensuring that the residences offer an idyllic retreat from the stress of everyday life."]

Located at the heart of Dubai's most desirable residential district, Jumeirah Park is a secure, family-orientated residential community spread over 350 hectares. The community contains 2,000 stylish, luxury family villas, surrounded by expansive, verdant, eco-friendly parks and green spaces, as well as a host of integrated amenities.
There are three basic villa designs at Jumeirah Park; Heritage, Regional and Legacy. The Heritage villas are spacious three bedroom residences with a total area of 3997 square feet (335.56 square metres). Regional villas comprise four and five bedroom residences, with a total area between 5071 and 5449 square feet (471.1 to 506.2 square metres). The Legacy villas are between 4851 and 5479 square feet (450.67 and 509 square metres). All provide generous living space, and are designed for modern family living with large open living spaces overlooking the back garden. Generous guest rooms and bedrooms, terraces, and well-designed kitchens feature. Each villa is designed with a garage and a beautiful large back yard."]
